TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsRuleRef extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: 表示指定对规则引用的语法元素。

span.span: Represents the grammar element that specifies a reference to a rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是特别有用，当你想要重用已定义了其内容的元素。The class is particularly useful when you want to reuse an element whose contents have already been defined. 通过重复使用现有规则，你可以更快地生成复杂的语法。By reusing existing rules, you can build complex grammars more quickly. 你可以使用的构造函数之一类来引用对象或`rule`元素如果满足以下条件：You can use one of the constructors of the class to reference an object or a `rule` element if the following is true: - 对象中包含的语法和的值是其属性是或。The object is in the containing grammar and the value of its property is or . - `rule`外部语法和的值中的元素是其`scope`属性是`public`。The `rule` element is in an external grammar and the value of its `scope` attribute is `public`. - `rule`外部的语法的值中的元素是其`scope`属性是`private`，并声明为`root rule`的外部的语法。The `rule` element is in an external grammar, the value of its `scope` attribute is `private`, and it is declared as the `root rule` of the external grammar. 此类表示`ruleref`元素中 World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 定义[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。This class represents the `ruleref` element as defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761). 璝惠 SRGS`ruleref`元素以及它支持通过 System.Speech，有关详细信息请参阅[规则元素引用](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/56eb0031-4908-4788-83ab-7c5e19aa4ac0)。For information about the SRGS `ruleref` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [ruleref Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/56eb0031-4908-4788-83ab-7c5e19aa4ac0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建的规则引用`rule`外部语法文件中的元素。This constructor creates a rule reference to a `rule` element in an external grammar file. 若要创建的规则引用对象中的相同的语法，请使用任何以下构造函数：To create a rule reference to an object within the same grammar, use any of the following constructors: - - -

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dictation As SrgsRuleRef

summary.span: 定义可与与此语法关联的听写主题定义的朗读输入匹配的规则。

span.span: Defines a rule that can match spoken input as defined by the dictation topic associated with this grammar.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Garbage As SrgsRuleRef

summary.span: 定义可与任何语音（到下一个规则匹配、下一个标记、或知道朗读输入结束）匹配。

span.span: Defines a rule that can match any speech up to the next rule match, the next token, or until the end of spoken input.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly MnemonicSpelling As SrgsRuleRef

summary.span: 指示语音输入可以包含单词的拼写的字母，并且拼写的字母可以识别为单词。

span.span: Indicates that speech input can contain spelled-out letters of a word, and that spelled-out letters can be recognized as a word.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Null As SrgsRuleRef

summary.span: 定义在缺少任何音频输入时自动匹配的规则。

span.span: Defines a rule that is automatically matched in the absence of any audio input.

span.span: Defines a rule that can never be spoken.

span.span: Inserting VOID into a sequence automatically makes that sequence unspeakable.
